resources.string: Welcome to Miniweam Demo App. Click "Enter" to continue

Hello World, this is Miniweam.Our brand name. 

We are into Mobile Application Development, Architectural Home Designs, Web Designs, and Graphic Designs. 

Any projects done as a portfolio, for clients, or for use will be updated here so as to keep users posted. 

For more information concerning our us, kindly navigate to the following web links below : 

-Galaxy store link at coming soon... 

-Github link at https://github.com/olaan5 

-Google Play Store link at coming soon... 

-Official Miniweam Website at https://olaal.super.site/
Our reason of existence and mission is to bring your vision to reality, and to empower every person we can on the planet to achieve more with the tools we create.

My name is Mobolaji Alexander ODESANMI. A fourth year undergraduate student at Ladoke Akintola University of Technology, Ogbomoso, Nigeria., I am pursuing BTech in Computer Science and Engineering. 

I am very passionate about Mobile Application Development. I am always ready to challenge myself and explore new areas of work. I never stop learning new things, and for me, each new project is a new adventure. 

I love designing Architectural Home. I also use Canva to design graphics used in my apps and for friends that need a flyer for their business. 

Recently, i started web designs. 

For more information concerning my portfolio, kindly visit the following web pages links indicated earlier above as I use Miniweam as a name to showcase my work.
